summary: The ringmaster of a flea circus inherits a fortune...if he can find which chair it's hidden in.
cast: Fred Allen|Jack Benny|Don Ameche|William Bendix|Victor Moore|Rudy Vallee|Binnie Barnes|Robert Benchley|Jerry Colonna|John Carradine|Gloria Pope|William Terry|Minerva Pious|Richard Tyler|Sidney Toler|George Cleveland|John Miljan|Ben Welden|Johnny Arthur|Jack Baxley|Brooks Benedict|Don Brodie|Steve Brodie|John Brown|George Chandler|James Conaty|Don Costello|Kernan Cripps|Daisy|Mike Donovan|Jay Eaton|Bess Flowers|Byron Foulger|Edward Gargan|Jack Gargan|Dick Gordon|Frank Hagney|Harry Harvey|Olin Howland|Lloyd Ingraham|Eddie Kane|Kenner G. title: It's in the Bag!
